resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107977</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107977</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206679</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cultura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">lets students in the U.S. communicate with students from France. It offers learners (and teachers alike) on both sides of the Atlantic a unique comparative, cross-cultural approach for gradually constructing knowledge of other values, attitudes and beliefs, in an ever-enlarging construction of the foreign culture.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">läßt Kursteilnehmer in den VEREINIGTEN STAATEN 
mit Kursteilnehmern von Frankreich verständigen. Es bietet 
Anfängern (und Lehrern gleich) auf beiden Seiten des Atlantiks eine 
eindeutige vergleichbare, Kreuz-kulturelle Annäherung für Wissen aus
anderen Werten, Haltung und Glaube stufenweise konstruieren, an einen 
überhaupt-vergrößernaufbau der fremden Kultur an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">laisse des étudiants aux ETATS-UNIS communiquer 
avec des étudiants de France. Elle offre à des étudiants (et 
à des professeurs de même) des deux côtés de l'Océan atlantique 
une seule approche comparative et croix-culturelle pour construire 
graduellement la connaissance avec d'autres valeurs, attitudes et 
croyance, dans une construction jamais-agrandissante de la culture 
étrangère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deixa estudantes nos ESTADOS UNIDOS comunicar-se 
com os estudantes de France. Oferece a learners (e a professores
igualmente) em ambos os lados do Atlântico uma aproximação 
comparativa, cruz-cross-cultural original para gradualmente construir 
o conhecimento de outros valores, atitudes e opinião, em uma 
construção deamplificação da cultura extrangeira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lascia gli allievi negli STATI UNITI comunicare 
con gli allievi dalla Francia. Offre a principianti (e ad 
insegnanti egualmente) da entrambi i lati dell'Atlantico un metodo 
comparativo e traversa-culturale unico per gradualmente la costruzione
della conoscenza con altri valori, atteggiamenti e credenza, in una 
costruzione d'ingrandimento della coltura straniera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αφήνει τους σπουδαστές στις ΗΠΑ να επικοινωνήσουν με 
τους σπουδαστές από τη Γαλλία. Προσφέρει στους αρχαρίους 
(και στους δασκάλους ίδια) και στις δύο πλευρές του Ατλαντικού 
μια μοναδική συγκριτική, διαπολιτισμική προσέγγιση για βαθμιαία 
να κατασκευάσει τη γνώση άλλων τιμών, τοποθετήσεις και 
πεποιθήσεις, σε μια κατασκευή πάντα-διεύρυνσης του ξένου 
πολιτισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">deja a estudiantes en los ESTADOS UNIDOS 
comunicarse con los estudiantes de Francia. Ofrece los 
principiantes (y a profesores igualmente) en ambas caras del 
Atlántico un acercamiento comparativo, cruz-cultural único para 
gradualmente construir el conocimiento de otros valores, actitudes y 
creencia, en una construcción de siempre-agrandamiento de la cultura 
no nativa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206679</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107977</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/cultura</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
